content: The Act titled "State and Local Cyber Protection Act of 2015" focuses on coordinating cybersecurity efforts between state and local governments with the National Cybersecurity and Communications Integration Center. The Homeland Security Act of 2002 is amended to include a new subsection focusing on State and Local Coordination on Cybersecurity. This involves assisting State and local governments in identifying information system vulnerabilities and security protections related to cybersecurity risks.
